info.author: Phil Adams
info.description:
lumos
=====

Generate a slide-deck from a single markdown file. With themes. Inspired by
[cleaver](https://github.com/jdan/cleaver).

install
-------

TOOD `pip install lumos`. Done.

Dependencies (installed along with lumos):

- [Pystache](https://github.com/defunkt/pystache)

- pretty default print stylesheet (for e.g. PDF export)
